profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Lean Center of excellence of the Rabobank.
The Lean Center of Excellence is responsible for the roll-out of Lean and Robotics in the total Rabobank and consists of Master Black Belts who guide the Rabobank in the Lean transformation. We developed a unique approach in combining Lean and Robotics delivering amazing results.
The role of the Lean Center of Excellence is:
- The implementation of Lean on strategic-, tactical- and operational level
- Guide complex- and Value Chain transformations including RPA (Robotics)
- Make the Black Belts in the organisation perform and achieve their target
- Act as subject matter experts on changemanangement and Lean-Six Sigma related issues
- Develop and maintain Rabo-Lean
